resources.string: Choose the desired day of the week and then press the \"Confirm\" button. The schedule will be displayed for the day of the week that is either today or upcoming. So, if you choose \"Monday\" on Tuesday, you will get the schedule for the next Monday. \nBut if you want to view the schedule for a specific day (for example, yesterday), then select the \"Choose Your Own\" option and enter the full date of the day in the window that appears. If anything, the initial date will correspond to today\'s date.

The next date format is: %s, where D - the day of week number, M - the month number, and Y - the year number. Use the following symbols as number separators (or a simple space character): \"\\\", \".\", \"-\", \"/\".
